alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 10 at 11:59PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Slick Travel Conditions... An area of mainly light snow will continue to move across the area over the next couple of hours. A quick accumulation of around a half inch will be possible. With temperatures at or just below the freezing mark, this will lead to some slippery travel conditions. In addition, winds gusting over 30 mph at times will lead to periods of reduced visibility. Temperatures are expected to continue warming above the freezing mark overnight, and should lead to mainly wet roads with some slush covered and patchy slick spots possible on untreated roadways. Be prepared for slippery travel conditions if you`re planning to travel overnight.
